short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Antcode extention that enables full repo reviews on GitHub or GitLab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables you to place comments on any line in a repo, not just the lines in a diff or a commit. It is hard to believe, but GitHub and GitLab do not support this natively.

This extension automates a neat, Git-based workaround. It creates a single pull / merge request out of the entire repo so that comments can be placed on any line. This is useful for code audits, planning for a refactoring, or giving someone comprehensive feedback on a project.

Support for GitLab is coming soon!

How to Use:
1. Navigate to the repo you want to be reviewed
2. Open the extension and follow the steps
3. Once the extension is done, you will have a new branch in your repo with one pull / merge request that will contain the entire repo. Other people can comment on and discuss any line in the repo.

Built by the team at Antcode, a platform where developers help other developers through open code reviews.
